mapper.insert: insert into product_order(order_amount, order_price, order_recipient, recipient_phone, recipient_address, board_num, client_num) values (#{orderAmount}, #{orderPrice}, #{orderRecipient}, #{recipientPhone}, #{recipientAddress}, #{boardNum.boardNum}, #{clientNum.clientNum})
mapper.update: update product_order set order_amount = #{orderAmount}, order_price = #{orderPrice}, order_recipient = #{orderRecipient}, recipient_phone = #{recipientPhone}, recipient_address = #{recipientAddress} where order_num = #{orderNum}
mapper.select: select * from product_order, client where product_order.client_num = client.client_num and client.client_num = #{num} order by oder_date desc

select order_num, oder_date, order_amount, order_price, order_recipient, recipient_phone, recipient_address, product_order.client_num, product_order.board_num, user.client_num, id, pw, name, email, phone, home_tel, address, join_date, status from product_order, sa_board, client where product_order.board_num = sa_board.board_num and sa_board.board_num = #{num} and product_order.client_num = client.client_num order by oder_date
